@Andrelamme @esanzi Amen! First Amendment rights were to guarantee dissent. Now, much dissent is seen as PI or offensive.

@Andrelamme @esanzi We should be teaching kids to learn from ugly past, not to reject it and demand we pretend it didn't exist.
@Andrelamme @esanzi Or Rockefeller, Carnegie, Stanford, and a host of others building railroads on backs of immigrant labor.
@Andrelamme @esanzi FDR and internment camps. Founding fathers as slave owners. Anti-Catholic political parties. Anti-suffrage parties.
@Andrelamme @esanzi I went to U.Va. (Jefferson), worked for Sen Byrd, now work at W Wilson Foundation. I'm a walking protest target.
@Andrelamme @esanzi And Lincoln did say, by today's standards, some things to Douglass that were racist.
@Andrelamme @esanzi American history is ugly. We learn from it. We don't wipe it from books because past doesn't align with current morals
@Andrelamme @esanzi Reported by Fox. If not true, then has been adopted as truth by many. Compete with "Lincoln Was a Racist" student sign
@esanzi And read story I just shared on K teacher only letting girls play with Legos in class in name of "gender equity!"
